content:
I am a Ph.D. student at the Institute for International Economic Studies (IIES), Stockholm University.
I was born and raised in Nagano, Japan, before moving to Osaka for my undergraduate study, during which I spent a year studying in Bloemfontein, South Africa. Before moving to Stockholm, I spent three years in Tokyo, for my master’s degree and 1+ years of the Ph.D. program in Economics.
